/wiki/Bastion_of_Faith: Bastion of Faith is an accessory for the 2nd edition of the Advanced Dungeons & Dragons fantasy role-playing game, published in 2000.
/wiki/Bruce_R._Cordell: Bruce Robert Cordell (born 1968)[citation needed] is an American author of roleplaying games and fantasy novels. He has worked on Dungeons & Dragons games for Wizards of the Coast. He won the Origins Award for Return to the Tomb of Horrors and has also won several ENnies. He lives in Seattle.
/wiki/Den_of_Thieves_(accessory): Den of Thieves is an accessory for the 2nd edition of the Advanced Dungeons & Dragons fantasy role-playing game, published in 1996.
/wiki/Fighter%27s_Player_Pack: Fighter's Player Pack is an accessory for the 2nd edition of the Advanced Dungeons & Dragons fantasy role-playing game.
/wiki/Thief%27s_Player_Pack: Thief's Player Pack is an accessory for the 2nd edition of the Advanced Dungeons & Dragons fantasy role-playing game.
/wiki/Land_of_Fate: Land of Fate is an accessory for the 2nd edition of the Advanced Dungeons & Dragons fantasy role-playing game, published in 1992.
/wiki/World_Builder%27s_Guidebook: World Builder's Guidebook is an accessory for the 2nd edition of the Advanced Dungeons & Dragons fantasy role-playing game, published in 1996.
/wiki/Richard_Baker_(game_designer): Richard Baker (full name L. Richard Baker III) is an American author and game designer who has worked on many Dungeons & Dragons campaign settings.
